description: Infiltration of the chest area refers to the abnormal accumulation of cells, fluid, or other substances within the tissues of the chest, particularly the lungs. This can lead to a variety of symptoms and complications depending on the underlying cause and severity.
precautions_we_need_to_take: Follow your doctor's recommendations for medication and treatment
symptoms_of_that_disease: Swelling in the legs or ankles
diet_we_need_to_follow: Consult a doctor or registered dietitian for personalized dietary advice
Focus on a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean protein
Limit processed foods, sugary drinks, and saturated and trans fats
Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water
affect_of_disease: Complications depending on the underlying cause (e.g., heart failure, sepsis)
